summary: The diff implements a comprehensive McKinsey-style redesign of the Network Directory page with card-based layouts, enhanced filtering, profile detail views, and professional styling. All five requirements (REQ-76 through REQ-80) show evidence of implementation with appropriate UI components, styling, and functionality.

hallucinated_features.description: WhatsApp integration functionality in StakeholderDetailView component with openWhatsApp() function
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest does not mention WhatsApp contact functionality as a requirement. This is an additional communication feature not requested in the specifications.

hallucinated_features.description: Dark mode color scheme implementation in index.css
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest focuses on matching McKinsey's light mode design aesthetic. Dark mode theming was not requested in any requirement or acceptance criteria.

hallucinated_features.description: Verified badge display functionality for stakeholders
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest does not mention displaying verification status or badges. This appears to be an additional profile enhancement not specified in the requirements.
